name: Waypoint Island
description:
Waypoint Island is a story-driven first person 3D small adventure where players have to free adorable pixel art animals from a 3D Island.

Ever since a mysterious storm swept over the land, the residents of WayPoint Island have been stuck there ever since. Nobody comes in and nobody leaves, and nobody knows why.

Make friends with the local animal residents by completing tasks and challenges that lead to freeing the island from the unknown force.
